title: ステイヤーズSの後に・メジロの大計

text.jpText:
『ステイヤーズS』を走り切り、
自らの才能を開花させたメジロブライト。
text.enText:
After running in the "Stayers S.," Mejiro 
Bright has developed her own talent.

text.jpText:
『皐月賞』『菊花賞』、そして今回――
中・長距離で結果を出した彼女はおばあ様に
幅広く走れる才能を持つウマ娘と認められた。
text.enText:
Satsuki-sho", "Kikka-sho", and now this time 
- she was recognized by her grandmother as a 
talented horsegirl with the ability to run a 
wide range of races. She was recognized by 
her grandmother as a horsegirl with the 
talent to run in a wide range of races.

text.jpText:
メジロ家の想いを継ぎ、
高祖が歩みきれなかった
輝きの銀河を歩むべく――
text.enText:
To carry on the Mejiro family's legacy, and 
to walk in the galaxy of brilliance that our 
ancestors were unable to walk in.

text.jpText:
メジロブライトは決意を新たに、
メジロ家が最も重んじるレース、
『天皇賞（春）』を目指すのだった。
text.enText:
With renewed determination, Mejiro Bright set 
her sights on the race that the Mejiro family 
holds in the highest esTM. The race that the 
Mejiro family holds most dear, the Tennou-sho 
(Emperor's Championship).
